#summary Features planned for the next release

=Partial to-do list for version 0.6.0=

The 0.6 version will add new features. The release goals are still being planned.

==Committed features and fixes==

  * Move streams collection to isolated storage so it won't be cleared during version upgrades, etc.
  * Refactor the data model.
  * Clean up the button glow implementation.

== Bugs ==

  * (no currently known bugs)

== Features to add ==

These features will be added before the release.

  * Make media keys apply even when Auremo is not focused.
  * Offer alternatives meanings to double-click or pressing Enter besides "add to back on playlist".
  * Add optional criteria for sorting albums. For example, the user should be able to choose alphabetical, chronological or filesystem ordering.
  * Add proper support for album date parsing, particularly support for formats other than YYYY.
  * Improve saved playlist interface.
  * Add settings for hiding individual music collection tabs.
  * Add version number to about window.
  * Add audio quality info to status bar.
